      • getSubmissionsRequests

        public static SubmissionRequest[] getSubmissionsRequests()
                                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                                         UdacityException
        Get the active submission request for the currently authenticated reviewer.
        Returns:
        The active (SubmissionRequestStatus == SubmissionRequestStatus.AVAILABLE) submission request objects. Under current constraints this should always be zero or one such requests.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if response is malformed
        UdacityException - if status code is not 2xx

                                             throws java.io.IOException,

        Get student feedback available for the authenticated reviewer.
        Parameters:
        startDate - Minimum StudentFeedback.createdAt date
        endDate - Maximum StudentFeedback.createdAt date
        Returns:
        Student feedback on submissions reviewed by authenticated user

        java.io.IOException - if response is malformed
        UdacityException - if status code is not 2xx

      • getStudentFeedbacks

        public static StudentFeedback[] getStudentFeedbacks()
                                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                                    UdacityException
        Get student feedback available for the authenticated reviewer.
        Returns:
        Student feedback on submissions reviewed by authenticated user. It will supply feedback created within the last 30 days.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if response is malformed
        UdacityException - if status code is not 2xx
